law.catch_line: The State Team shall be a multidisciplinary and multiagency review team, composed of at least 25 mem...

text.section: The members described under subsection (a)(1) through (12) of this section may designate representatives from their departments or offices to represent them on the State Team.

The State Team may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget. Each member of the Team under subsection (a)(1) through (12) of this section shall provide sufficient staff support to complete the State Team's responsibilities.

Members of the State Team shall serve without compensation, but may be reimbursed for reasonable expenses incurred in the performance of their duties in accordance with the Standard State Travel Regulations and as provided in the State budget.
The State Team shall select a chairperson from among its members.
The State Team shall meet not less than once every 3 months.
